title: Lila's Wolf
description: When Lila Cammell is abandoned by her time-jumping partner, leaving her alone in Britain in the Dark Ages, revenge is the only thing on her mind. Sheâ€™d trusted Jared Grohl with her life and her heart, and bringing him to justice will be sweet.  Finding him captured and enslaved by the Saxons changes all her assumptions. Now it's a fight for survival, but the only way to save him, might be to leave him behind.
author: Sofia Grey
